newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: CRICKET-Wellington win toss, bat in Cup final.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-Wellington win toss, bat in Cup final.

text.p: WELLINGTON, Jan 14 - Wellington won the toss and opted to bat first in the Shell Cup one-day cricket final at the Basin Reserve on Tuesday.
Both sides have stayed with the lineups which proved successful in the semifinals.
Wellington: Roger Twose (captain), Phil Chandler, Scott Weenink, Jason Wells, Richard Petrie, Robbie Kerr, Gavin Larsen, Paul Jarvis, Chris Nevin, Mark Jefferson, Glenn Jonas.
Canterbury: Lee Germon (captain), Darrin Murray, Nathan Astle, Craig McMillan, Stephen Fleming, Chris Cairns, Chris Harris, Mark Priest, Glenn Muir, Geoff Allott, Warren Wisneski.
